channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description:
[center]The server source richscape has no "nonwild" codes at all, so can someone help me with the code to making safe zones? No Copy and Paste... i like to learn new things to make my coding skills better. Thanks all for ur help.
i have a code like this or something... [code=java](absX >= 3294 && absX <= 3298 && absY >= 3651 && absY <= 3648)) {[/code] [/center]

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

no, that wouldn’t work. Try searching for “wild” or “insafezone” first. If you can’t find those or something similar to them then I’ll give more help.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @sudd3n_h0p3 sudd3n h0p3
item.description:
@sudd3n_h0p3 wrote:

but where do i put it and what do i put there, cuz the server i have is richscape, and it has no “nonwild” codes in it, and i need help, ty 4 ur help so far

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Okay (absX >= 3294 && absX <= 3298 && absY >= 3651 && absY <= 3648)) { means that any space in that square of xy coords will be absent of pking. change the numbers around so that it misses about a 30 by 30 square area and make it into a pk box!

Read full topic
